group_desc: All raw vegetables, e.g., lettuce, cabbage, carrot, tomato, cucumber, onion, etc. All cooked vegetables, e.g., broccoli, cauliflower, zucchini, greens, beets, etc. Starchy vegetables, e.g., peas, corn, squash. Potatoes and their varieties are not included.
All raw fruits, e.g., oranges, apples, pears, bananas, peaches, etc. All dried fruits, e.g., apricots, raisins, figs, etc. Natural fruit juices (100% without added sugar).

Consists of grains and starchy vegetables like bread, rice, pasta, and potatoes. These foods are rich in carbohydrates and nutrients like fiber, vitamins, and minerals, providing energy and supporting overall health.
Consists of milk and its products,for example cheese or yogurt. Does not include butter
Lentils, Beans, Chickpeas, Fava beans, Dry peas, Varieties of all the above
Beef, veal, Pork, Lamb, sheep, Goat, Game: e.g., wild boar, deer, hare, All processed products of the above
Chicken, Turkey, Duck, Rabbit, Game: e.g., pheasant, quail, partridge, All processed products of the above

Fish, for example, sardines, anchovy, hake, sprat, horse mackerel, scorpionfish, red porgy, bogue, cod, haddock, tuna, sea bass, sea bream, mullet. Seafood (mollusks, crustaceans, shellfish), for example, squid, cuttlefish, octopus, shrimp, mussels, oysters.

group_name: Added Fats and Οils, Οlives and Νuts
group_desc: Added fats and oils: Olive oil Other plant-based oils (seed oils): sunflower oil, corn oil, soybean oil, sesame oil, etc. Margarine Butter Olives Nuts and seeds Walnuts, almonds, pistachios, hazelnuts, etc. Sunflower seeds, sesame seeds, etc. Spreads derived from the above (e.g., tahini)
